weapon_description: This jade vessel was created by a hero of yesteryear. Legend has it that it once shot the giant dragon that dwelt in the volcano down from the skies.
weapon_skill_description: Using an Elemental Skill grants the Jade-Forged Crown effect: Every 1,000 Max HP will increase the Normal Attack DMG dealt by the equipping character by 1% for 10s. Normal Attack DMG can be increased this way by a maximum of 32%.
